title: A Crafty Day
author: Luna
pages: Building something new is always an adventure. Today, we decided on a blocky little hideout.
Mittens handled each block like a delicate piece of art, while Rufus enthusiastically fetched and toppled in equal measure.
When our rickety hut was finally finished, it became an instant haven from the day's adventures.
Though not perfect, it was ours, a place to dream and rest, and even Rufus seemed proud as he curled up inside.
